title: Merck nears deal for rare-disease-drug maker Acceleron
text:
Should a deal come together, it would be one of Merck's MRK biggest and represent a bet on the treatments for the respiratory and blood diseases that Acceleron XLRN specializes in.

Merck appears to have beaten out other potential suitors for Acceleron including Bristol Myers Squibb Co., BMY which already owns a big stake in the company.

An expanded version of this story is available at WSJ.com
